translation.en: [girl] Dear Diary...
go fuck yourself.
Just kidding. I don't know what to write in this stupid thing.
translation.de: War nur Spaß. Ich weiß nicht, was ich schreiben soll.

translation.en: Anyway, hi.
My name is Sydney.
I'm a boring 17-year-old white girl.
I'm not special, is what I'm trying to say,
translation.de: Nichts Besonderes, will ich damit sagen,

translation.en: and I'm okay with that.
-♪ I'm not like everybody else ♪ -We moved to Pennsylvania two years ago.
translation.de: Wir zogen vor zwei Jahren nach Pennsylvania,

translation.en: And not, like, a cute part of Pennsylvania either, but corn and cabbage and shit.
translation.de: und nicht in eine hübsche Gegend, sondern eine voller Mais und Kohl.

translation.en: Like, my town's won the grand prize for most polluted air in America
translation.de: Meine Stadt gewinnt den Preis für die schlechteste Luftqualität

translation.en: for a bunch of years in a row now, so...
-♪ 'Cause I'm not like everybody else ♪ -...yippee.
Ms. Cappriotti made me promise to do this.
translation.de: Ich musste das hier Ms. Cappriotti versprechen.

translation.en: Promise you'll do this.
She said it might help with my moods.
translation.de: Es soll gegen meine Launen helfen.

translation.en: It might help with your moods.
I keep losing my temper.
-♪ Like everybody else ♪ -I don't want to, but it just spills out.
translation.de: Ich will es nicht. Es schwappt einfach über.

translation.en: It's 'cause my dad sort of died... last spring.
translation.de: Weil mein Dad im letzten Frühling starb.

translation.en: So I'm supposed to write... what, now? I don't get it.
translation.de: Was soll ich schreiben? Verstehe ich nicht.

translation.en: Anything. Everything.
Whatever comes to mind.
And now no one knows what to say to me.
translation.de: Keiner weiß, wie er mit mir reden soll.

translation.en: Think of it like you're just talking to yourself
and no one will ever read it but you.
translation.de: Keiner außer Ihnen wird es je lesen.

translation.en: [Sydney] Not even the guidance counselor.
Can I just...
use my phone?
Hmm... Your phone'll be distracting. Don't you think?
translation.de: Das Handy lenkt Sie ab. Glauben Sie nicht auch?

translation.en: I'd like you to have something a little more...
translation.de: Ich hätte für Sie gern etwas...

translation.en: therapeutic.
These things are never easy,
but I do want you to at least attempt
to have a normal high school experience.
I mean, she's pretty all right, I guess.
Even if she does smell like an old hippie.
translation.de: Aber sie riecht wie ein alter Hippie.

translation.en: Anyway, here's to a normal high school experience,
whatever the fuck that means.
And yes, during arousal, there is an increase in all sorts of things,
translation.de: Im erregten Zustand steigern sich viele Dinge:

translation.en: including adrenaline and, of course, blood flow,
and the blood flow continues down
and then gets trapped within the corpora cavernosa.
translation.de: und staut sich in den Corpora cavernosa. Der Penis schwillt an.

translation.en: The penis expands, and this is how the Homo sapien male
translation.de: und staut sich in den Corpora cavernosa. Der Penis schwillt an. So kann der männliche Homo sapiens eine Erektion aufrechterhalten.

translation.en: is able to hold an erection.
translation.de: So kann der männliche Homo sapiens eine Erektion aufrechterhalten.

translation.en: Yes.
From my experience, Mr. File, the holding of an erection is far more successful
translation.de: Meiner Erfahrung nach, Mr. File, ist das Halten der Erektion erfolgreicher

translation.en: in the hands of a Homo sapien female.
translation.de: in den Händen eines weiblichen Homo sapiens.

translation.en: Very funny, Mr. Lewis.
Just talkin' science.
Moving on.
When a female gets sexually excited, there is also increased blood flow
translation.de: Ist eine Frau sexuell erregt, fließt auch mehr Blut in die Genitalien...

translation.en: -to the genitals... -Ah. Oh, come on, fire crotch.
translation.de: Ist eine Frau sexuell erregt, fließt auch mehr Blut in die Genitalien... Los, flammendes Schamhaar, lach mal. Das war witzig.

translation.en: -Laugh. That was funny. -[Mr. File] ...proceeds to swell.
translation.de: Los, flammendes Schamhaar, lach mal. Das war witzig.

translation.en: Why is all this happening?
-[laughs] -Your scrotum looks different than others.
That's an asymmetrical scrotum.
-[Sydney] My best friend is Dina. -Having one is not at all unusual.
[Sydney] She's such a badass.
Normally, I don't think she'd choose me as a friend, but we both moved here around the same time.
translation.de: Sie hätte mich nie als Freundin gewählt, aber wir zogen gleichzeitig her.

translation.en: Both the new kids in town, you know, so, guess I kinda lucked out.
translation.de: Beide neu in der Stadt. Dabei hatte ich also Glück.

translation.en: Before Dina, I mostly just kept to myself.
translation.de: Vor Dina blieb ich meistens für mich.

translation.en: I'm not the kind of person that likes attention, really,
but she has this way about her that...
translation.de: aber sie hat so eine Art...

translation.en: she just makes me feel different.
translation.de: Bei ihr fühle ich mich anders.

translation.en: She was with me when I found out about my dad.
translation.de: Sie war da, als ich das von Dad erfuhr.

translation.en: Okay. You ready?
-She held my hand. -One, two... We cried.
translation.de: Sie hielt meine Hand. Wir weinten.

translation.en: And now, since then, she keeps me laughing when all I wanna do is melt into the floor.
translation.de: Und seitdem bringt sie mich zum Lachen, wenn ich nur im Boden versinken will.

translation.en: Which sort of made me realize I've never had a best friend before.
translation.de: Dadurch wurde mir klar, dass ich nie eine beste Freundin hatte.

translation.en: So, I'm standing there, trying to get by, and he's all like,
translation.de: Ich stehe da und will vorbei, und er so:

translation.en: "Oh, who's the new girl in town?" And I'm like, "Shut up. It's me, Dina."
translation.de: "Oh, wer ist die Neue?" Und ich: "Klappe. Ich bin's, Dina."

translation.en: Wait, this is Brad... Lewis?
Yeah.
He's sort of sweet, you know?
And then he asked me to homecoming.
translation.de: Er hat mich zum Schulball eingeladen.

translation.en: Wait, and... and you accepted?
No. I told him to take his washboard abs and chiseled jawline
translation.de: Nein, ich sagte ihm, er soll seine Muckis nehmen

translation.en: and get out of my face.
[laughs] Yeah, of course I said yes.
Uh-- Oh, my God. You had sex with him, didn't you?
translation.de: Gott. Du hattest Sex mit ihm, oder?

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Holy shit.
No way! Holy shit!
You gave Bradley Lewis your V-card?
translation.de: Bradley Lewis war dein erstes Mal?

translation.en: -Tell me he used a condom, because-- -Yes, of course.
I know.
Dina just got her braces off, and her boobs suddenly arrived.
translation.de: Dina hat keine Zahnspange mehr und plötzlich Brüste.

translation.en: So, of course, golden boy Bradley Lewis takes notice.
translation.de: Natürlich fällt das dem Goldjungen Bradley Lewis auf.

translation.en: So, what, are you guys, like, suddenly girlfriend and boyfriend or something?
translation.de: Seid ihr jetzt plötzlich zusammen oder so?

translation.en: I mean, we haven't put a label on it yet, but...
translation.de: Wir haben es noch nicht festgemacht, aber...

translation.en: I really like him, okay?
This is the worst.
Yeah. Oh, yeah. No. Sure, I get it.
Just give him a chance.
Oh, come on, there's gotta be someone you sort of like. Just a little.
translation.de: Es muss jemanden geben, den du magst, nur ein bisschen.

translation.en: I don't know. I just guess I haven't really thought about it.
translation.de: Ich habe noch nicht darüber nachgedacht.

translation.en: Well, think about it.
And then maybe we can all go to homecoming together, like a double date thing.
translation.de: Denk darüber nach, dann gehen wir als Doppel-Date zum Schulball.

translation.en: -Hey, babe. -Hey!
Sorry I'm late.
-All good, babe. -[kissing]
Ugh. They both call each other "babe." Kill me right now.
translation.de: Sie nennen einander Babe. Ich will sterben.

translation.en: Do you think your mom could hook us up with some burgers? They're just so great here.
translation.de: Könnte deine Mom uns Burger besorgen? Die sind hier so lecker.

translation.en: Huh. She's not working today.
I was just asking. [laughs]
Okay.
[Dina] Want a burger, Brad? Let's get a burger.
I've got some cash.
-[Brad] Yeah? -Yeah.
-Wanna share one, babe? -Yeah. Oh, ketchup.
Help yourself.
So...
Dina's just great, isn't she?
[chuckling] Jesus, do you ever smile?
Not today.
[Dina] So, what have we decided?
Whatever you want, babe.
-Please. Please stop. -You gotta try one of these fries.
-I wish you would just stop talking. -[rumbling]
Wipe that smug smile off his stupid, stupid face.
translation.de: Ich will ihm das selbstzufriedene Grinsen aus dem Gesicht wischen.

translation.en: -Oh, shit. -[Dina] Oh, my God.
Oh, fuck.
-[Dina] Are you okay? -Wait. What?
Yeah, fine. Just give me a minute.
-[Dina] Take a tissue. -[Brad] Gimme a minute, all right?
translation.de: Hier, ein Tuch. Nur eine Minute, ok?

translation.en: So, here's the deal.
Today, I almost convinced myself
that I made Bradley Lewis's nose bleed
with my mind.
Right.
Mostly, I just need to chill out more.
I am not losing my first and only very best friend ever.
translation.de: Ich verliere nicht meine erste und einzige beste Freundin.

translation.en: I'm happy for Dina,
and if dating Bradley Dickhead Lewis makes her happy,
translation.de: Wenn Bradley Vollidiot Lewis sie glücklich macht,

translation.en: then I guess I'm okay with it.
[boy] Oh, hey, Syd!
He lives down the street from me.
translation.de: Er wohnt bei mir in der Nähe.

translation.en: Where I feel shitty about basically everything about myself,
translation.de: Während ich fast alles an mir scheiße finde,

translation.en: Stan is the master of zero fucks.
translation.de: geht Stan alles am Arsch vorbei.

translation.en: Oh, my leg fell asleep. One sec.
Can I walk with you?
Sure. Why not?
Stan is kind of... weird.
You okay?
Shoes. Who needs 'em?
Uh... so, Bloodwitch, am I right?
What?
Bloodwitch. You like their music? That's a... terrible name for a band.
translation.de: -Bloodwitch. Magst du ihre Musik? -Schrecklicher Name für eine Band.

translation.en: Nah. Perfect.
Bet they sound like shit.
Well, I mean, I have-- I have 'em on vinyl...
translation.de: Ich meine, ich habe sie auf Vinyl...

translation.en: limited edition, gatefold and stuff,
translation.de: ...Limited Edition, Klappcover. Falls du mal rüberkommst, können wir sie zusammen hören.

translation.en: if you wanna... come over, and we can listen sometime.
translation.de: Klappcover. Falls du mal rüberkommst, können wir sie zusammen hören.

translation.en: We can get high.
I have never been high before.
Yeah, maybe.
I mean, you don't have to.
I was-- I was just, you know... We-- You know, we live so close, and we've never really hung out before.
translation.de: Wir wohnen so dicht nebeneinander und haben noch nie was gemacht.

translation.en: Uh, no, I guess we haven't.
But, yeah. Uh, maybe we should.
translation.de: Aber, ja. Vielleicht sollten wir das machen.

translation.en: Yeah.
Cool. Uh...
Let me know.
What a world we live in, Sydney.
translation.de: Was für eine Welt, in der wir leben.

translation.en: I live with my mom and little brother.
translation.de: Mom, mein kleiner Bruder und ich leben zusammen.

translation.en: [woman] Sydney! Is that you?
Mom and I haven't been getting along lately.
Nope. It's an axe murderer. Good thing you asked.
translation.de: Nein. Ich bin ein Axtmörder. Gut, dass du fragst.

translation.en: Ha-ha! Very funny.
Hey. So apparently, Karen's dog ran through a screen door or something,
translation.de: Karens Hund ist anscheinend durch eine Fliegengittertür gelaufen.

translation.en: so she had to go to an emergency vet.
-Okay. -So I'm gonna pick up her shift tonight,
which is fine 'cause I owe her two shifts from the time Liam ate all that cheese.
translation.de: Ich schulde ihr zwei Schichten von damals, als Liam so viel Käse aß.

translation.en: Well, thanks for telling me your life story, Mom.
No. Wait, come back here. I'm not done yet. Eyes on me.
translation.de: Komm zurück. Ich bin nicht fertig. Sieh mich an.

translation.en: Okay. Question. Big question. Have you seen my stockings?
translation.de: Ok. Frage. Wichtige Frage. Hast du meine Strumpfhose gesehen?

translation.en: They were in the bathroom. They were hanging over the shower curtain?
translation.de: Sie hing im Bad über dem Duschvorhang.

translation.en: Oh, sorry. I thought they were dirty.
-No, they were drying. -Well, I found them in the bathtub.
translation.de: -Nein, sie trocknete. -Sie lag in der Wanne.

translation.en: D-- Well, where are they? They're my last pair.
translation.de: Wo ist sie? Es ist mein letztes Paar.

translation.en: I sort of...
washed 'em.
Wait. In the washer?
Yeah, and I guess they sort of ended up in the dryer, so...
translation.de: Ja, und dann landete sie im Trockner und...

translation.en: Oh, great.
Now I get to feel like sausage while I'm serving it.
translation.de: Dann serviere ich als Wurstpelle Würstchen.

translation.en: You don't really have to wear 'em, do you? No one wears 'em anymore.
translation.de: Du musst sie nicht tragen. Keiner trägt die mehr.

translation.en: -Like, since the '90s. -[sighs] Can you--
Can you just make sure that Liam does his homework and eats some dinner?
translation.de: Pass auf, dass Liam Hausaufgaben macht und etwas isst.

translation.en: Isn't he old enough to make sure himself?
translation.de: Er ist alt genug, das weiß er selbst.

translation.en: Sydney, can you just do something for me, anything, just once, without questioning?
translation.de: Kannst du etwas für mich tun, nur einmal, ohne alles infrage zu stellen?

translation.en: Here I thought I was being so charming.
translation.de: Und ich hielt mich für charmant.

translation.en: Nope. Not even a little bit.
Really doesn't matter what we're talking about.
translation.de: Es ist egal, worüber wir reden.

translation.en: -[door slams] -Mom and I could sit in silence
translation.de: Mom und ich könnten lebenslang schweigen,

translation.en: for the rest of our lives, and she'd still annoy the crap out of me.
translation.de: Mom und ich könnten lebenslang schweigen, und sie würde mich trotzdem nerven.

translation.en: Hey, Goob. Done your homework yet?
Hours ago.
Soon as I got home. What about you?
Uh... I'll get to it.
Come on, Syd. Mom says you have to work hard if you're gonna succeed.
translation.de: Mom sagt, man muss hart arbeiten, wenn man Erfolg haben will.

translation.en: Yeah, well, the plan's always been for me to sit back and watch you succeed, Goob.
translation.de: Mein Plan war immer, zuzuschauen, wie du Erfolg hast, Blödi.

translation.en: Oh, hey, who knows?
Maybe one day, if you really work hard enough,
you get to be the one to pay for my funeral.
-How was school today? -Well, um...
Richard Rynard punched Toby Gardner in the face,
translation.de: Richard Rynard schlug Toby Gardner ins Gesicht

translation.en: and he got sent to Mr. Coffee's office.
translation.de: und musste zu Mr. Coffee ins Büro.

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
Yup, and I think I might be next, so... I'm devising a plan. Check it out.
translation.de: Ja, und ich bin wohl der Nächste, also mache ich einen Plan. Sieh mal.

translation.en: [Sydney] Holy shit, Goob. Is that for you?
translation.de: Heilige Scheiße. Ist das für dich?

translation.en: [Liam] Yup. Designed it myself.
Breastplate, shin guards, spiked gloves...
But I'm not so sure about the helmet situation just yet,
translation.de: Beim Helm bin ich noch unsicher.

translation.en: 'cause I don't wanna block my peripherals, you know, just in case.
translation.de: Ich will mein Blickfeld nicht einschränken.

translation.en: It's really cool, man. It's some of your best work yet.
translation.de: Echt cool. Eine deiner besten Arbeiten.

translation.en: Yeah, it's basically my Mark One, and the first suit's always the hardest to design,
translation.de: Ja, mein erstes Modell. Der erste Anzug ist immer der schwerste.

translation.en: so it's still a work in progress.
And, sorry, what was the plan again?
translation.de: Und wie war der Plan noch mal?

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna build the suit and kick Richard Rynard's ass.
translation.de: Ich baue den Anzug und mache Richard Rynard platt.

translation.en: Oh. Vengeance.
Got it.
My family.
I guess we've never had a lot of money.
Like, every place we moved, and we've moved a lot,
it's always some place like this.
translation.de: und immer an Orte wie diese.

translation.en: It's like a lottery, I guess.
Some kids win big time the moment they're born.
translation.de: Manche Kids ziehen bei der Geburt das große Los.

translation.en: The rest of us,
we're all stuck with scratch-offs and bottle caps and shit.
translation.de: müssen uns mit Rubbellosen und Kronkorken zufriedengeben.

translation.en: -♪ To destroy that feeling ♪ -Liam?
Yeah?
If Richard Rynard ever touches you...
before you get your suit built to kick his ass,
I'll pull his throat out...
with my bare hands right in front of Mr. Coffee.
translation.de: vor den Augen von Mr. Coffee heraus.

translation.en: Really?
Yeah. Yeah, like this.
-You are so weird. -[laughing]
Yeah, I know.
Okay, so... confession.
I started getting these zits on my thighs.
translation.de: Ich kriege Pickel auf den Beinen.

translation.en: -I am straight up disgusting. -[water dripping]
I've tried zit cream and soap and all sorts of junk.
translation.de: Ich habe Salbe, Seife und alles Mögliche ausprobiert.

translation.en: Nothing helps. -They're not even that fun to pop. -[rumbling]
translation.de: Nichts hilft. Selbst das Ausdrücken macht keinen Spaß.

translation.en: [groans] Stop!
It's probably just puberty.
translation.de: Es ist wohl nur die Pubertät.

translation.en: I don't know.
So, Stanley Barber texted me.
-He made me listen to Bloodwitch. -[message alert]
Sometimes at night, I want to touch myself,
translation.de: Manchmal will ich mich nachts berühren,

translation.en: but I don't.
Peanut butter helps.
Millions have discovered the secret...
[Sydney] The later Mom gets home, the more wine she drinks.
translation.de: Je später Mom heimkommt, desto mehr Wein trinkt sie.

translation.en: What are we watching?
[muffled] Don't know.
[Sydney] We haven't talked about Dad since he killed himself in the basement.
translation.de: Wir sprachen nicht über Dad, seit er sich im Keller umbrachte.

translation.en: AC's broken. The unit's probably just... overheated.
translation.de: -Die Klimaanlage ist kaputt. -Das Gerät ist bestimmt nur... überhitzt.

translation.en: It's hot as balls in this house.
Open a window.
It's that heavy thing we're all too afraid to talk about.
translation.de: Wir haben alle Angst, über diese schwere Sache zu reden.

translation.en: I got called in... to the counselor's office.
-Why? What did-- what did you do? -Nothing.
She just...
She wants me to have, like... an outlet or something.
translation.de: Sie will, dass ich ein Ventil habe oder so.

translation.en: An outlet for what?
Just, sometimes it feels like...
the people I love don't love me back.
translation.de: ...die Leute, die ich liebe, lieben mich nicht.

translation.en: Well... [sighs]
Maybe you're aiming too high, hon.
She's such a bitch sometimes.
translation.de: Sie kann so ein Miststück sein.

translation.en: Dad would have understood, but he hung himself,
translation.de: Dad hätte es verstanden, aber er erhängte sich,

translation.en: so I guess I'm on my own.
Sometimes I wonder why he did it,
translation.de: Manchmal frage ich mich, warum er es tat

translation.en: and why we never talk about it...
translation.de: und warum wir nie darüber reden.

translation.en: ...and what the hell is going on with me.
translation.de: Und was mit mir los ist.

translation.en: Why sometimes I feel like I'm boiling inside.
translation.de: Warum ich manchmal glaube, innerlich zu kochen.

translation.en: 'Cause maybe...
...I am way more fucked up than I thought.
